trans-unit.resname: C19·5 | Sevinne's Reclamation | Card Name
C19·5 | Sevinne's Reclamation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. If this spell was cast from a graveyard, you may copy this spell and may choose a new target for the copy.
trans-unit.target: 将目标法术力值等于或小于3的永久物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。如果此咒语是从坟墓场施放，则你可以复制此咒语，且可以为该复制品选择新的目标。

trans-unit.resname: C19·5 | Sevinne's Reclamation | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Flashback {4}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 返照{4}{W}（你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.resname: C19·20 | Nightmare Unmaking | Card Name
C19·20 | Nightmare Unmaking | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C19·20 | Nightmare Unmaking | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: • Exile each creature with power greater than the number of cards in your hand.
trans-unit.target: •放逐所有力量大于你手牌数量的生物。

trans-unit.resname: C19·20 | Nightmare Unmaking | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: • Exile each creature with power less than the number of cards in your hand.
trans-unit.target: •放逐所有力量小于你手牌数量的生物。

trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；

trans-unit.resname: C19·22 | Anje's Ravager | Card Name
C19·22 | Anje's Ravager | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME attacks each combat if able.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击。

trans-unit.resname: C19·22 | Anje's Ravager | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, discard your hand, then draw three cards.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，弃掉你的手牌，然后抓三张牌。

trans-unit.resname: C19·22 | Anje's Ravager | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Madness {1}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 疯魔{1}{R}（如果你弃掉此牌，将之弃到放逐区。当你如此作时，支付其疯魔费用施放之，否则便将其置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: C19·23 | Backdraft Hellkite | Card Name
C19·23 | Backdraft Hellkite | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C19·23 | Backdraft Hellkite | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，直到回合结束，你坟墓场中的每张瞬间与法术牌均获得返照异能。其返照费用等同于该牌的法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: C19·24 | Dockside Extortionist | Card Name
C19·24 | Dockside Extortionist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create X Treasure tokens, where X is the number of artifacts and enchantments your opponents control. (Treasure tokens are artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出X个珍宝衍生物，X为由对手操控之神器和结界的总数量。（珍宝衍生物是具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: C19·27 | Ignite the Future | Card Name
C19·27 | Ignite the Future | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile the top three cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards. If this spell was cast from a graveyard, you may play cards this way without paying their mana costs.
trans-unit.target: 放逐你牌库顶的三张牌。直到你下一个回合的回合结束，你可以使用这些牌。如果此咒语是从坟墓场施放，则你以此法使用这些牌时，可以不支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: C19·27 | Ignite the Future | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Flashback {7}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 返照{7}{R}（你可以从你坟墓场中施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.resname: C19·30 | Wildfire Devils | Card Name
C19·30 | Wildfire Devils | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, choose a player at random. That player exiles an instant or sorcery card from their graveyard. Copy that card. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场和在你的维持开始时，随机选择一位牌手。该牌手从其坟墓场放逐一张瞬间或法术牌。复制该牌。你可以施放该复制品，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: C19·33 | Ohran Frostfang | Card Name
C19·33 | Ohran Frostfang | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Attacking creatures you control have deathtouch.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控且进行攻击的生物具有死触异能。

trans-unit.resname: C19·33 | Ohran Frostfang | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: C19·34 | Road of Return | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；

trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；

trans-unit.resname: C19·36 | Voice of Many | Card Name
C19·36 | Voice of Many | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw a card for each opponent who controls fewer creatures than you.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，每有一位操控生物数量比你少的对手，你便抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: C19·37 | Anje Falkenrath | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；

trans-unit.resname: C19·38 | Atla Palani, Nest Tender | Card Name
C19·38 | Atla Palani, Nest Tender | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}: Create a 0/1 green Egg creature token with defender.
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}：派出一个0/1绿色，具守军异能的蛋衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: C19·38 | Atla Palani, Nest Tender | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever an Egg you control dies, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的蛋死去时，从你牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张生物牌为止。将该牌放进战场，其余则以随机顺序置于你牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: C19·39 | Chainer, Nightmare Adept | Card Name
C19·39 | Chainer, Nightmare Adept | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Discard a card: You may cast a creature spell from your graveyard this turn. Activate only once each turn.
trans-unit.target: 弃一张牌：本回合中，你可以从你的坟墓场中施放一个生物咒语。每回合只能起动一次。

trans-unit.resname: C19·39 | Chainer, Nightmare Adept | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, if you didn't cast it from your hand, it gains haste until your next turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个非衍生物的生物在你的操控下进战场时，若你未从你手上施放之，则它获得敏捷异能直到你的下一个回合。

trans-unit.resname: C19·40 | Elsha of the Infinite | Card Name
C19·40 | Elsha of the Infinite | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
trans-unit.target: 灵技（每当你施放非生物咒语时，此生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。）

trans-unit.resname: C19·40 | Elsha of the Infinite | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: You may look at the top card of your library any time.
trans-unit.target: 你可以随时检视你的牌库顶牌。

trans-unit.resname: C19·40 | Elsha of the Infinite | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: You may cast noncreature spells from the top of your library. If you cast a spell this way, you may cast it as though it had flash.
trans-unit.target: 你可以从你的牌库顶施放非生物咒语。如果你以此法施放咒语，则你可以将之视同具有闪现异能地来施放。

trans-unit.resname: C19·50 | Tahngarth, First Mate | Card Name
C19·50 | Tahngarth, First Mate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be blocked by more than one creature.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能被多于一个生物阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: C19·50 | Tahngarth, First Mate | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent attacks with one or more creatures, if Tahngarth is tapped, you may have that opponent gain control of Tahngarth until end of combat. If you do, choose a player or planeswalker that opponent is attacking. Tahngarth is attacking that player or planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手以一个或数个生物攻击时，若坦格尔斯已横置，则你可以令该对手获得坦格尔斯的操控权直到战斗结束。若你如此作，则选择任一该对手所攻击的牌手或鹏洛客。坦格尔斯向该牌手或鹏洛客进行攻击。

trans-unit.resname: C19·53 | Bloodthirsty Blade | Card Name
C19·53 | Bloodthirsty Blade | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and is goaded. (It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物得+2/+0且已煽惑。（它每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击，且若能攻击除你以外的牌手，则必须如此作。）

trans-unit.resname: C19·53 | Bloodthirsty Blade | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}: Attach CARDNAME to target creature an opponent controls. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: {1}：将CARDNAME贴附至目标由对手操控的生物上。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.resname: C19·55 | Idol of Oblivion | Card Name
C19·55 | Idol of Oblivion | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Draw a card. Activate only if you created a token this turn.
trans-unit.target: {T}：抓一张牌。只能于你派出过衍生物的回合中起动。

trans-unit.resname: C19·55 | Idol of Oblivion | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {8}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Create a 10/10 colorless Eldrazi creature token.
trans-unit.target: {8}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：派出一个10/10无色奥札奇衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: C19·56 | Pendant of Prosperity | Card Name
C19·56 | Pendant of Prosperity | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield under the control of an opponent of your choice.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一位对手。CARDNAME在该牌手的操控下进战场。

trans-unit.resname: C19·56 | Pendant of Prosperity | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}: Draw a card, then you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield. CARDNAME's owner draws a card, then that player may put a land card from their hand onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}：抓一张牌，然后你可以将一张地牌从你手上放进战场。CARDNAME的拥有者抓一张牌，然后该牌手可以将一张地牌从其手上放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: C19·57 | Scaretiller | Card Name
C19·57 | Scaretiller | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME becomes tapped, choose one —
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME成为横置时，选择一项～

trans-unit.resname: C19·57 | Scaretiller | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: • You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: •你可以将一张地牌从你手上横置放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: C19·57 | Scaretiller | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: • Return target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: •将目标地牌从你的坟墓场横置移回战场。
